scenes.description: Ouro Kronii performs the song "ETERNAL SNOW" on a futuristic 3D stage with glowing stairs and floating panels.
Kronii finishes her song and bids farewell to the viewers.

subtitles.original: 一度も言葉にはしてないけど
subtitles.english: I've never put it into words before,

subtitles.original: 降り積もり続けてゆく
subtitles.english: It just keeps falling and piling up.

subtitles.original: Hold me tight こんな思いなら
subtitles.english: Hold me tight, if it was going to be like this,

subtitles.original: 誰かを好きになる気持ち 知りたくなかったよ
subtitles.english: I didn't want to know the feeling of falling in love.

subtitles.original: I love you 涙止まらない
subtitles.english: I love you, the tears won't stop,

subtitles.original: こんなんじゃ 君のこと知らずにいれば良かったよ
subtitles.english: If it's like this, I wish I'd never known you.

subtitles.original: 君をいつまで想っているのかな
subtitles.english: How long will I keep thinking of you?

subtitles.original: ため息が窓ガラスを曇らせた
subtitles.english: My sighs have clouded up the window glass.

subtitles.original: 揺れる心 灯すキャンドルで
subtitles.english: With the candle lighting my trembling heart,
